QuestData.Title: Like Father, Like Son
QuestData.Description: He's done it again! My son took my knife and yelled something about a 'chromatic hide,' then ran off for the Spire! What would he even do with something like that, wear it around like a cape?$B$BIf it's not too much to ask, would you keep an eye out for the knife? You know, next time you're around Upper Blackrock Spire. Which, hopefully, is soon. VERY soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Pip's Improved Skinner in Blackrock Spire.
